lines: 1. God sent His Son, they called Him Jesus, He came to love, heal, and forgive; He lived and died to buy my pardon, An empty grave is there to prove my Saviour lives.
Refrain : Because He lives I can face tomorrow, Because He lives all fear is gone; Because I know He holds the future. And life is worth the living just because He lives.
2. How sweet to hold a newborn baby, And feel the pride, and joy he gives; But greater still the calm assurance, This child can face uncertain days because He lives.
